segments.text: Good afternoon , Mr Meng ! It's nice to see you today . It's been a while , hasn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Miao Ping . Yes , it has . I've been in Saudi Arabia for the last 6 weeks on business . I did have a little time to relax in Dubai , though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I envy you , Mr Meng ! What can I do for you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I need to effect a payment under my L / C . Not the old one , the new one my Assistant came in and dealt with last week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right . Do you have the code for that one ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's DG193445782100 . Can you find it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here it is . Have you got the advice slip with you ? You have sufficient funds in the account , so we can go ahead .
segments.speaker: S1
